restaurantName: La Tavola Rossa di Vincenzo Guarino
description: With just ten seats and an open-view kitchen, this restaurant literally reduces the space between chef Vincenzo Guarino and his guests in order to guarantee an interactive dining experience. There’s just one tasting menu with a strict focus on home-made ingredients, including delicious bread and rolls.
